item.title: Russian
item.description: 2. Russian Handwriting: More on Pronunciation 2.2 Word stress Just like in English, the stress of words can influence the pronunciation of words and must be memorized. When a letter is stressed, it will be written with a `. The following letters change in ‘pronunciation’: letter not stressed stressed о [а] [о] 2.5/2.6 Softness and hardness of consonants Soft means that the consonant is pronounced with a simultaneous y sound Hard means pronounced like English consonants Examples:
